snippet: The 10-date package provides programming for Fox Sports 1 and gives horse racing valuable exposure beyond the Triple Crown and the Breeders’ Cup.
abstract: Fox Sports is getting into the horse racing business, entering a multiyear agreement with the Jockey Club to present prominent graded stakes races, beyond Triple Crown and Breeders' Cup, on television starting in 2014.
lead_paragraph: The 10-date package provides programming for Fox Sports 1 and gives horse racing valuable exposure beyond the Triple Crown and the Breeders’ Cup.

headline.main: Fox Sports Will Present Horse Racing Package
headline.print_headline: Fox Sports Will Present Horse Racing Package
